definition: to put on a hat/to be first/to dub
arteries and veins/vein (on a leaf, insect wing etc)

sentences.english: Motion artifact constitutes the most important challenge to coronary artery imaging.
sentences.chinese: 運動僞影一直是冠脈成像的一個最大挑戰。

sentences.english: Objective To probe the clinical and angiographical characteristics of patients with postprandial angina.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討餐後心絞痛臨牀及冠脈病變的特點。

sentences.english: Family history of premature CHD was significantly associated with CAC in all ethnic groups.
sentences.chinese: 在所有種族中早期冠心病家族史與冠脈鈣化顯著相關。

sentences.english: For the elderly patients with the normal outcome of abnormal coronary angiography, Qi-stagnation syndrome is more.
sentences.chinese: 冠脈造影結果正常的患者氣滯證比較多見。

sentences.english: Serum interleukin 1,6,10 in patients with acute coronary syndromes.
sentences.chinese: 急性冠脈綜合徵患者血清白介素1，6，10的變化。

sentences.english: Rat models of myocardial infarction were established by ligation of coronary artery.
sentences.chinese: 以冠脈結紮法制備大鼠心肌梗死模型。

sentences.english: Background The long-term safety and efficacy of drug-eluting coronary stents have been questioned.
sentences.chinese: 藥物洗脫冠脈支架的長期安全性和有效性尚存疑問。

sentences.english: No coronary artery arising from the non-coronary sinus is found.
sentences.chinese: 未見無冠狀動脈竇發出冠脈者。

sentences.english: Acute coronary syndrome is often diagnosed in an emergency room or hospital.
sentences.chinese: 急性冠脈綜合徵常常在急診室或醫院裏被確診。

sentences.english: Conclusion OPCAB is safe and less invasive with less complications.
sentences.chinese: 結論非體外循環下冠脈搭橋術創傷小，併發症少。

sentences.english: Angioplasty uses a balloon-like device to crush the material blocking an artery.
sentences.chinese: 冠脈成形術利用一個球形的裝置擠壓阻塞動脈的物質。

sentences.english: The relation be- tween coronary stenosis and myocardial perfusion was analysed.
sentences.chinese: 分析冠脈狹窄程度與心肌灌注減少的關係。

sentences.english: What are some of the advantages or the problem of the intracoronary OCT and comparing those two techniques?
sentences.chinese: 比較這兩種技術，冠脈內OCT技術的優點有哪些？
